content: The United States Cattlemen’s Association is asking the @USDA to define the term “beef.” They say that some products being sold with the label “beef” or “meat” are actually made from alternative proteins and products grown in laboratories... not from the animal itself. https://t.co/MyFw5NXKCj
@TimStieger @DrNealBarnard @NYCMayor @NYCSchools But it requires a certain level of knowledge, to ensure all the nutrients are there... Alternative sources of protein, etc. /1
